question: Tim Bergling, who passed away recently, was the noted dance music star of which country?
explanation: Tim Bergling (28), who is one of the world\'s biggest dance music stars, has passed away in Muscat, Oman on April 21, 2018. He is popularly known as DJ Avicii. He was a Swedish musician, DJ, remixer and record producer. His club anthems include Wake Me Up, Levels, and recently, Lonely Together with Rita Ora.
